titleStmt.title: The second booke of the dialogues of S. Gregorie the Greate the first pope of that name containing the life and miracles of our Holie father S. Benedict. To which is adioined the fule of the same holie patriarche translated into the Englishe tonge by C.F. priest & monke of the same order.
Dialogi. Part 2. English
titleStmt.author: Gregory I, Pope, ca. 540-604.
Batt, Antonie.
Fursdon, John, d. 1638.
Gregory I, Pope, ca. 540-604. Short treatise touching the confraternitie of the scapular of St. Benedicts order.

publicationStmt.publisher: by the widow of F. Wyon] Permissu superiorum,

notesStmt.note: Translated by J.C. Fursdon; completed by A. Batt.--STC.
Actual place of publication and printer's name from STC.
"The rule of our most holie father S. Benedict patriarche of moncke" (divisional title page) has separate pagination and register.
"A short treatise touching the confraternitie of the scapular of St. Benedicts order." has separate title page, dated 1639, pagination and register.
Reproduction of original in the Folger Shakespeare Library, Washington, D.C.
